basics.name: German Velibekov
basics.label: Senior Mobile Developer
basics.summary: I am a Software Developer with eight years of experience, who has proven background in designing and implementing complex apps and systems. I have expert knowledge of the SW development life cycle, including design, coding, testing, debugging, deployment and maintenance. I'm highly self-organized, with a proven ability to handle full SW development/release cycle, and particularly passionate about app architectures and automation of work processes. I'm keen on sharing my knowledge with the rest of the programming community through articles on Medium , as well as contributing to the open source projects on GitHub. I'm a quick learner with a thirst to expand my already vast knowledge, and I excel at conceptualizing and implementing new and innovative ideas to help organisations reach their goals.

work.summary: Leading an iOS development as part of a technical team, providing a cross-application solutions across the bank products and successfully integrating it into existing systems.

Acted as technical lead for the development of an enterprise level framework for pipelining of application customization for different customers. Lead the development of solution architecture of main company product.

Developed the company flagship product and managed a small team of developers, including training new starters, allocating tasks, determining project timeframes, conducting performance reviews, and motivating the team to meet deadlines and achieve higher quality results.

Contributed to a key organisation products and created multiple mobile applications from zero, taking role of a leading mobile developer in company. Created main workflows inside the mobile department, as part of a constant and productive work with clients.
